00088 typedef unsigned long VertexIndex;
00089 
00092 struct QubitVertex {
00096    LocCliffOp byprod;
00098    hash_set<VertexIndex> neighbors;
00102    QubitVertex (void)
00103      : byprod (lco_H) {};
00104 };

00119 class GraphRegister {
00120   public:
00123    vector<QubitVertex> vertices;
00124    GraphRegister (VertexIndex numQubits, int randomize = -1);
00125    GraphRegister (GraphRegister& gr);
00126    ~GraphRegister () {};
00127    void local_op (VertexIndex v, LocCliffOp o);
00128    void hadamard (VertexIndex v);
00129    void phaserot (VertexIndex v);
00130    void bitflip (VertexIndex v);
00131    void phaseflip (VertexIndex v);
00132    void cphase (VertexIndex v1, VertexIndex v2);      
00133    void cnot (VertexIndex vc, VertexIndex vt);
00134    int measure (VertexIndex v, LocCliffOp basis = lco_Z, 
00135       bool* determined = NULL, int force = -1);
00136    Stabilizer & get_full_stabilizer (void) const;

00138    void print_adj_list (ostream& os = cout) const;
00139    void print_adj_list_line (ostream& os, VertexIndex i) const;
00140    void print_stabilizer (ostream& os = cout) const;

00169 
00171 inline void GraphRegister::local_op (VertexIndex v, LocCliffOp o) {
00172    vertices[v].byprod = o * vertices[v].byprod;
00173 }
00174 
00176 inline void GraphRegister::hadamard (VertexIndex v) {
00177    local_op (v, lco_H);
00178 } 
00179 
00182 inline void GraphRegister::phaserot (VertexIndex v) {
00183    local_op (v, lco_S);
00184 } 
00185 
00187 inline void GraphRegister::bitflip (VertexIndex v) {
00188    local_op (v, lco_X);
00189 } 
00190 
00192 inline void GraphRegister::phaseflip (VertexIndex v) {
00193    local_op (v, lco_Z);
00194 }
